content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, it's indeed an pleasure to showcase our apartment in Munich to you. Let us focus on discussing the rental price for now. To start negotiations, I propose a price of 1500 Euros per month. Haoyu Wang, if you find this acceptable, you can say 'I agree to the price of [1500] Euro!' to finalize this part of the conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the proposal, but after considering my financial situation and market research, I would like to negotiate a lower price. Let's continue discussing the rental cost.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Understood Mr. Wang. While I aim to secure the highest price possible, I'm open to reasonable discussions. As negotiations continue, please remember to respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' if a mutually acceptable price is found, replacing [x] with the final amount. However, if we cannot reach an agreement, the negotiation will terminate with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
